name: THESIGN OF TIME
description:
Thesign is a creative digital agency working under Information Technologies and Communication Platforms.
Conceived in November 2011, we bring together the will and commitment of skilled people, with more than 15 years of experience. Most of them within a Research and Development Unit on the largest Polytechnic Institute in the country.
We assume us as a technology-based company whose DNA results from a combination of creativity, design and technology. Motivated by the search for technological solutions to specific problems, we anticipate future scenarios by exploiting emerging technologies witch are converted into global, evolutionary and scalable projects.
